DOC.brief_summary: Aim of the study is to evaluate the risk reduction of intraperitoneal mesh-implementation after laparotomy (Group 1) in a randomized control trial compared with patients with standard abdominal closure (Everett-suture). This is the primary endpoint. Second endpoints are the feasibility of mesh-implementation even after colorectal surgery, find risk factors for wound infection and incisional hernia.
DOC.criteria: Informed consent Median Laparotomy Bowel perforation Pregnancy Palliative surgery Drug abuse Age under 18 Mental disability Allergy to mesh components
